options.content:
# Agentic Evals Overview

This dashboard provides an overview of the agentic workflow evaluation metrics.

**Key Metrics:**
- Pass rate over time by workflow
- First failure pareto (bar chart of step ids)
- Latency p50/p95
- Cost per task
- Coverage metrics (tools_used, retry_rate, backtrack_depth)

**Alert Rules:**
- Pass rate drop > 10% in 24h
- New top-1 first_failure_at persists > 3h
- p95 latency > SLO
